20110101023317.000|20110101023319.000|CC1|IN FACT, THIS IS USUALLY THE    
20110101023319.000|20110101023320.000|CC1|MOST QUIET TIME OF YEAR FOR BOTH

20110101023325.000|20110101023326.000|CC1|DOWN AS RECORD SETTING FOR BOTH.
20110101023326.000|20110101023328.000|CC1|HERE IN CINCINNATI, OHIO, THE   
20110101023328.000|20110101023329.000|CC1|SITE OF THREE FATALITIES.

20110101023335.000|20110101023336.000|CC1|140 MILES AN HOUR.              
20110101023336.000|20110101023338.000|CC1|HOW DID ALL OF THIS HAPPEN?     
20110101023338.000|20110101023339.000|CC1|WE MENTIONED THAT WARM AIR      
20110101023339.000|20110101023341.000|CC1|COMING UP FROM THE GULF.        
20110101023341.000|20110101023344.000|CC1|IT WAS JUST ENOUGH TO MIX WITH  
20110101023344.000|20110101023346.000|CC1|SOME VERY TURNING WINDS IN THE  
20110101023346.000|20110101023347.000|CC1|LOWER ATMOSPHERE, ALL COMING    
20110101023347.000|20110101023350.000|CC1|TOGETHER AT JUST THE RIGHT TIME,
20110101023350.000|20110101023352.000|CC1|RELATIVELY LOW ODDS OF THAT     
20110101023352.000|20110101023353.000|CC1|TAKING PLACE, BUT ALL OF IT     
20110101023353.000|20110101023355.000|CC1|HAPPENED EARLY THIS MORNING,    
20110101023355.000|20110101023356.000|CC1|AGAIN, PRODUCING 20 TORNADOES,  
20110101023356.000|20110101023358.000|CC1|STRETCHING ACROSS FOUR STATES.  
20110101023358.000|20110101023400.000|CC1|70 SEVERE WEATHER REPORTS, AS   
20110101023400.000|20110101023401.000|CC1|WELL.

20110101023402.000|20110101023404.000|CC1|GOOD.

20110101023406.000|20110101023408.000|CC1|NOT EVEN UP ON THIS HOLIDAY

20110101023643.000|20110101023644.000|CC1|>> Reporter: GOOD EVENING KATE, 
20110101023644.000|20110101023645.000|CC1|FROM TIMES SQUARE.              
20110101023645.000|20110101023648.000|CC1|SECURITY OFFICIALS SAY THERE ARE
20110101023648.000|20110101023650.000|CC1|NO SPECIFIC THREATS BUT THIS IS 
20110101023650.000|20110101023652.000|CC1|NONETHELESS A MAJOR UNDERTAKING 
20110101023652.000|20110101023654.000|CC1|FOR THE NEW YORK CITY POLICE

20110101023714.000|20110101023716.000|CC1|OUT.
